bioconda.name: rmap
bioconda.summary: rmap is a short reads mapper for next-generation sequencing data

biocontainers.name: rmap
biocontainers.summary: rmap is a short reads mapper for next-generation sequencing data

biotools.summary: Assembles 20 - 64 bp Solexa reads to a FASTA reference genome. By Andrew D. Smith and Zhenyu Xuan at CSHL. (published in BMC Bioinformatics). POSIX OS required.

bioschemas.name: RMAP
bioschemas.summary: Assembles 20 - 64 bp Solexa reads to a FASTA reference genome. By Andrew D. Smith and Zhenyu Xuan at CSHL. (published in BMC Bioinformatics). POSIX OS required.
